entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Strathroy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:22 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
